meanings.definition: To meet or come together in secret
meanings.sent1: The two friends decided to mistryst in the park to plan a surprise party.
meanings.sent2: They always mistrysted at the library to study together without distractions.
meanings.sent3: The squirrels in the garden seemed to mistryst under the moonlight, sharing secrets.
meanings.sent4: The shadows mistrysted in the alley, whispering secrets to each other.
meanings.sent5: The spies mistrysted in the dark alley, exchanging valuable information.
